title: STABBING Drops Off ABORTED Tour, EXTERMINATION DISMEMBERMENT Joins
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 2 hours ago
text: Stabbing has dropped off their coming tour with Aborted, Ingested, and Peeling Flesh and is being replaced by Extermination Dismemberment. The tour kicks off on February 13 at the Goldfield in Roseville, CA and wraps up on March 15 at the Nile in Phoenix, AZ. Tickets are available here. "Unfortunately we won't be able to make this upcoming run with Aborted, Ingested and Peeling Flesh early next year," wrote Stabbing of their absence. "The sickos in Extermination Dismemberment will be rounding out this already massive lineup instead. Make sure you catch a show when this tour rolls through your town!" 2/13 Roseville, CA Goldfield2/14 Los Angeles, CA 17202/15 San Diego, CA Brick By Brick2/16 Las Vegas, NV Sinwave (no Peeling Flesh)2/18 Lubbock, TX Jake's2/19 Tulsa, OK Vanguard2/20 Omaha, NE The Waiting Room2/21 Chicago, IL Reggies2/22 Columbus, OH King of Clubs2/23 Detroit, MI The Shelter2/25 Toronto, ON Axis2/26 Montreal, QC Fairmount Theatre (no Extermination Dismemberment)2/27 Albany, NY Empire Underground2/28 Brooklyn, NY Monarch3/01 Worcester, MA Palladium3/02 Pittsburgh, PA Preserving3/04 Mechanicsburg, PA Lovedraft's3/05 Baltimore, MD Soundstage3/06 Greensboro, NC Hangar 18193/07 Atlanta, GA Masquerade (Hell)3/08 Tampa, FL Orpheum3/09 Orlando, FL The Abbey3/11 Houston, TX Scout Bar3/12 San Antonio, TX The Rock Box3/13 Dallas, TX Southside Music Hall3/14 Albuquerque, NM Launchpad (no Peeling Flesh)3/15 Phoenix, AZ Nile (no Peeling Flesh) Want More Metal? html:
Stabbing has dropped off their coming tour with Aborted, Ingested, and Peeling Flesh and is being replaced by Extermination Dismemberment. The tour kicks off on February 13 at the Goldfield in Roseville, CA and wraps up on March 15 at the Nile in Phoenix, AZ. Tickets are available here.

"Unfortunately we won't be able to make this upcoming run with Aborted, Ingested and Peeling Flesh early next year," wrote Stabbing of their absence. "The sickos in Extermination Dismemberment will be rounding out this already massive lineup instead. Make sure you catch a show when this tour rolls through your town!"
